channel.description: Recent content in Plugins on Advanced Slides Documentation

item.title: Menu
item.description: A slideout menu plugin for Advanced Slides to quickly jump to any slide by title. To enable Menu you have to enable the Plugin in Advanced Slides Settings

item.title: Overview
item.description: Press the »ESC« or »O« keys to toggle the overview mode on and off. While you’re in this mode, you can still navigate between slides, as if you were at 1,000 feet above your presentation. You could also activate Overview Mode by pressing the Overview Button on the bottom right corner. To enable Overview you have to enable the Plugin in Advanced Slides Settings

item.title: Chalkboard
item.description: With this plugin you can add a chalkboard to slides. The plugin provides two possibilities to include handwritten notes to your presentation: you can make notes directly on the slides, e.g. to comment on certain aspects, you can open a chalkboard on which you can make notes. The main use case in mind when implementing the plugin is classroom usage in which you may want to explain some course content and quickly need to make some notes.

item.title: Elapsed Time Bar
item.description: A plugin adding a progress bar based on the elapsed time, that helps you keeping the time in presentations. To set the time for presentation add a timeForPresentation property into your slides frontmatter with the time you want to present in seconds. To enable Elapsed Time Bar you have to enable the Plugin in Advanced Slides Settings
